Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Ale waste collection schedule app

Next.js app with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS that shows waste pickup
schedules for addresses in Ale kommun. Includes PWA support, offline
caching, dark mode, and notification reminders.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
